text: René Moawad (; 17 April 1925 – 22 November 1989) was a Lebanese politician. He was elected as the 13th President of the Lebanese Republic for 18 days in 1989, from the 5th to 22nd of November.Lebanon's president killedNew President of Lebanon killed == Death == On November 22, 1989, seventeen days after being elected, Moawad, 64, and 23 others were killed as he is returning from Lebanon's Independence Day celebrations by a 250 kg car bomb was detonated next to his motorcade in West Beirut. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Presidents of Lebanon Category:Asian lawyers Category:Assassinated Lebanese people
title: René Moawad
